ygData.subject: Re: Juggling instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: My secret is just this: don t rush. Eventually you get faster and faster. you just have to make sure you are over the slot before clicking to release. On the
ygData.messageBody:
My secret is just this: don't rush. Eventually you get faster and faster. you
just have to make sure you are over the slot before clicking to release.

On the subject of dropping something: I almost lost my tentacle whip by dropping
it. After wandering around for 10 minutes before finding it I learned a trick
for when you drop something. The instinctive urge is to turn around and go look
for it. RESIST THIS URGE. What you want to do is stop and walk backwards looking
at the ground as it passes. This way you cover the exact same ground and are
almost assured of finding what you dropped.

Taelin








Warren Wang <wwang@...> on 07/03/99 11:59:45 PM

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com








To: EQ Bards <eqbards@onelist.com>

cc: (bcc: Terry Chlebek/DPT)



Subject: [eqbards] Juggling instruments









From: Warren Wang <wwang@...>

So how does everyone else manage to juggling instruments/weapons and
not drop something on the ground? I just lost a fine steel spear,
which I spent most of my bank account on (money isn't exactly prolific
at level 8). Tried to shout and see if someone would return it, but
alas to no avail. Yes I'm using the inventory-as-hotkey method. I
have no problem juggling 2-3 songs, but trying to switch instruments
is a serious PITA with the risk of dropping something.

Warren, aka Erol of Cazic-Thule
